trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Logan
There were no other sightings in Logan on or around September 27th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the night of September 27, 2013 my wife and I were returning to our home on Rauber rd from Logan. It was about 7:00 pm and was just starting to get dusk. We had just passed Nixon rd and my wife looked across the road and said "look at those" she saw six light hovering in a line, when I looked over four of them disappeared and their was two left hovering. they were about 5-6 feet off the ground hovering and pulsating, I could see the tree line behind them and the really strange part was there was a deer and a fox in the field watching them. We witnessed them for about 10 seconds and as we were driving away they both disappeared and the animals ran into the woods.
